arStrings.szText: An ancient token used by the Horadrim to enter {c_rare}The Pit of the Artificer{/c}. Most often found in {c_important}Whisper Caches{/c}, {c_important}Helltide{/c} and {c_important}Legion Chests{/c}, and from {c_important}Nightmare Dungeons{/c} and {c_important}World Bosses{/c}.
A surprisingly light material that glows faintly.
